title: Quantum for Mars
description: This is a project made to assist Mars rover to identify Mars Terrain, with a Quantum approach.

title: Brain Tumor Detection
description: This is a project made to make the detection of brain tumor much faster and efficient.

title: BasicSudoku
description: A basic Sudoku game in Python and PyGame.Uses Python for game logic and PyGame for the graphical interface. It lets players play while ensuring Sudoku rules are followed.
